hotels.name: Rosewood Little Dix Bay
hotels.desc: Ultra-luxury beachfront resort, highly recommended, Caribbean paradise
hotels.longDesc: A highly acclaimed ultra-luxury resort in Virgin Gorda offering pristine beaches, world-class service, and exclusive accommodations for discerning travelers.
hotels.address: Valley, Lee Rd, Spanish Town VG1150, British Virgin Islands

hotels.name: Necker Island
hotels.desc: Ultra-exclusive private island, billionaire retreat, Caribbean paradise
hotels.longDesc: The world's most exclusive private island destination offering unparalleled privacy and luxury in the British Virgin Islands.

hotels.name: Oil Nut Bay
hotels.desc: Luxury private island resort, infinity pools, pristine beaches, world-class amenities
hotels.longDesc: A secluded luxury retreat offering private villas with stunning ocean views, multiple pools, and exclusive beach access. Perfect for families seeking an ultra-premium island escape.
hotels.address: Virgin Gorda Oil Nut Bay, British Virgin Islands

hotels.name: Fort Recovery Beachfront Villas & Suites
hotels.desc: Beachfront villa resort, private pools, historic fort ruins, family-friendly accommodations
hotels.longDesc: Historic oceanfront property featuring spacious villas with private pools and beach access. Families enjoy exploring nearby fort ruins and peaceful tropical gardens.
hotels.address: Town Road Tortola, 98PF+GQ6, Freshwater Pond, British Virgin Islands

hotels.name: The Hideout
hotels.desc: Boutique beachfront hotel, artistic design, intimate setting, excellent beach access
hotels.longDesc: Charming small hotel with colorful Caribbean décor and direct beach access. Great for families wanting personalized service and a more intimate island experience.
hotels.address: White Bay Jost van Dyke, VG1160, British Virgin Islands

hotels.name: Scrub Island Resort, Spa & Marina
hotels.desc: All-inclusive resort, water sports facilities, spa services, private island setting
hotels.longDesc: Exclusive all-inclusive island resort with water sports activities, wellness spa, and family-friendly amenities. Perfect for active families seeking variety and convenience.
hotels.address: Scrub Island VG1120, British Virgin Islands

restaurants.name: The Dove Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Fine dining restaurant, Caribbean cuisine, romantic ambiance, sunset views
restaurants.longDesc: Upscale dining featuring creative Caribbean dishes with fresh local ingredients. Offering beautiful sunset views and an elegant atmosphere perfect for special family dinners.
restaurants.address: 67 Main St, Tortola VG1110, British Virgin Islands

restaurants.name: Myett's Restaurant & Hotel
restaurants.desc: Casual beach restaurant, fresh seafood, tropical garden setting, laid-back vibe
restaurants.longDesc: Relaxed beachfront eatery serving fresh-caught seafood and local specialties. Family-friendly with a beautiful garden setting and excellent views of the bay.
restaurants.address: Cane Garden Bay Rd, Leonards, British Virgin Islands

restaurants.name: CocoMaya Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Casual dining, healthy cuisine, smoothie bowls, vegetarian options, beachside location
restaurants.longDesc: Casual restaurant specializing in fresh, healthy cuisine with great smoothie bowls and vegetarian choices. Family-friendly beachside spot perfect for lunch or casual dinner.
restaurants.address: Virgin Gorda, VG1150, British Virgin Islands

restaurants.name: Bananakeet
restaurants.desc: Charming cafe, coffee specialty, baked goods, light breakfast and lunch, cozy atmosphere
restaurants.longDesc: Cozy local cafe serving excellent coffee, fresh pastries, and light meals. A favorite morning stop for families wanting authentic island breakfast experience.

restaurants.name: The Rock Cafe
restaurants.desc: Casual waterfront spot in The Valley with fresh fish and toddler-friendly atmosphere
restaurants.address: CHV6+75V, Tower Rd, Spanish Town VG1150, British Virgin Islands

restaurants.name: Bath and Turtle and Rendezvous Bar
restaurants.desc: Casual beachfront restaurant and bar at Virgin Gorda Yacht Harbour
restaurants.address: FH28+Q2V, Spanish Town, British Virgin Islands

restaurants.name: Top of the Baths
restaurants.desc: Casual Caribbean dining with spectacular sunset views and family-friendly atmosphere
restaurants.address: Baths Hill, CHH5+P2Q, Spanish Town, British Virgin Islands

restaurants.name: Quitos Gazebo & Luxury Inn
restaurants.desc: Beachfront restaurant at Cane Garden Bay known for fresh seafood and live music
restaurants.address: Cane Garden Bay Tortola, VG1110, British Virgin Islands

restaurants.name: Sebastian's On The Beach
restaurants.desc: Beachfront bistro with fresh fish and kids menu on Apple Bay
restaurants.address: West End Tortola, Apple Bay VG1110, British Virgin Islands

restaurants.name: Village Cay
restaurants.desc: Waterfront restaurant and marina in Road Town with Caribbean cuisine
restaurants.address: C9FJ+7W6, Nibbs St, Road Town VG1110, British Virgin Islands

restaurants.name: Pusser's
restaurants.desc: Classic Caribbean pub near ferry terminal with family-friendly menu and famous painkillers
restaurants.address: WaterFront Drive Road Town, Road Town VG1110, British Virgin Islands

restaurants.name: LSL Restaurant
restaurants.desc: French-Caribbean fusion in Spanish Town with elegant but relaxed family atmosphere
restaurants.address: 2066 Avenue Rd, North York, ON M5M 4A6, Canada

restaurants.name: Chez Bamboo Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Creole cuisine in a garden setting with high chairs and kids portions
restaurants.address: FH28+Q2 Spanish Town, British Virgin Islands Spanish Town, Spanish Town VG1150, British Virgin Islands

restaurants.name: Sugar Mill Hotel
restaurants.desc: Fine dining restaurant in a historic sugar mill at Apple Bay
restaurants.address: Little Apple Bay, VG1130, British Virgin Islands

experiences.name: The Baths
experiences.desc: Natural rock formations, scenic swimming pools, hiking trails, stunning coastal views
experiences.longDesc: Iconic natural wonder featuring massive granite boulders creating natural pools and grottos. Families enjoy swimming, exploring caves, and hiking scenic trails.

experiences.name: Callwood Rum Distillery
experiences.desc: Historic rum distillery, authentic production methods, tasting tours, local heritage
experiences.longDesc: One of the world's oldest rum distilleries offering authentic tours and tastings. Educational and entertaining for older family members interested in local history.
experiences.address: Cane Garden Bay, British Virgin Islands

experiences.name: Mount Sage National Park
experiences.desc: Mountain hiking trails, tropical forest, panoramic island views, diverse wildlife
experiences.longDesc: Lush mountain park offering scenic hiking trails through tropical forest with breathtaking island vistas. Families enjoy nature walks and spotting local birds and wildlife.
experiences.address: Mount Sage National Park, British Virgin Islands

experiences.name: Smuggler's Cove
experiences.desc: Protected family beach with calm waters and beautiful sand near the resort

experiences.name: Cane Garden Bay
experiences.desc: Popular family-friendly beach on Tortola's north shore with calm waters and facilities
experiences.address: Cane Garden Bay, British Virgin Islands

experiences.name: Spring Bay
experiences.desc: Family-friendly beach adjacent to The Baths with calm waters and boulder formations

experiences.name: Savannah Bay Beach
experiences.desc: Calm shallow beach perfect for toddlers with powdery sand and gentle waves
experiences.address: FH7H+HQ, Savannah Bay, British Virgin Islands

experiences.name: Fort Recovery
experiences.desc: 17th century Dutch fort ruins on the western coast of Tortola
experiences.address: Sir Francis, Sir Francis Drake Hwy, British Virgin Islands

experiences.name: Cane Garden Bay Beach
experiences.desc: Family-friendly crescent beach with calm waters and spectacular sunsets

experiences.name: Long Bay Beach Resort
experiences.desc: Mile-long white sand beach with shallow water perfect for young children

kidFriendly.name: Coral World Ocean Park
kidFriendly.desc: Family beach, calm waters, snorkeling, marine life viewing, water sports facilities
kidFriendly.longDesc: Beautiful family-friendly beach with calm shallow waters perfect for young swimmers. Excellent snorkeling opportunities and available water sports rentals for active families.
kidFriendly.address: 6450 Coki Point, St Thomas, Virgin Islands 00802, USVI

markets.name: Bobby's Supermarket
markets.desc: Local farmers market, fresh produce, artisan crafts, local goods, authentic island experience
markets.longDesc: Vibrant weekly market featuring fresh local produce, handmade crafts, and authentic island goods. Families enjoy exploring stalls and discovering local flavors and artisan products.
markets.address: C9FJ+83P, Road Town, British Virgin Islands

a.name: Caribbean Family Paradise (7 Days)
a.description: Sail through turquoise waters, explore magical rock pools, and build sandcastles on pristine beaches at a pace perfect for little adventurers.
